name: Let's Craft pottery challenge
description:
Have fun crafting and molding clay into beautiful ceramic pottery shapes; painting, stamping & customizing it to your liking.
Once youíre done, the fun continues as you build your own private art gallery of your favorite self-made pottery pieces and you can challenge your friends making different shapes off pottery . You can even project your artwork onto tables and pedestals using augmented reality in your home to see what it looks like in the real world.

Share your ceramic art with your friends and challenge them to who makes the best pottery vessels , status ... and more
You can share your ceramic pottery over social networks, or with the ReallyMake community where others may pay ReallyPoints to buy your artwork!

What you can do with the app?
1. Create beautiful ceramic & pottery pieces
2. Paint, stamp & customize ceramic art to your liking
3. Save finished ceramic pottery pieces in your art gallery
4. Share you pottery game skills with your friends
5. Invite you friends to pottery 3D Game

Downlowd and player Pottery 3D now , it s FREE and
